dcterms:description: A benchmark consisting of natural prompts from MSCOCO, each containing at least two color words modifying different objects, with contrast captions created by switching the positions of color words.
dcterms:title: Attribute Binding Contrast set (ABC-6K)

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing images of common objects in context, widely used for training and evaluating image recognition models.
dcterms:title: MSCOCO

dcterms:description: A set of prompts that follow a specific sentence pattern of conjunctions, designed to evaluate compositional generation capabilities.
dcterms:title: Concept Conjunction 500 (CC-500)
